tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_connections (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  target_id UUID NOT NULL,
  interaction_type VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
	id INT UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY,
	source_id INT NOT NULL,
	target_id INT NOT NULL,
	interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE targets (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, age INT, profession TEXT);
CREATE TABLE connections (id INT PRIMARY KEY, source_id INT, target_id INT, strength INT, relationship TEXT);
CREATE TABLE interactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, connection_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, details TEXT);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id INT NOT NULL,
    target_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    interaction_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE targets (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  occupation VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  target_id UUID,
  target_interaction_id UUID,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
  interaction_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE connections (
  connection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  target_id UUID,
  connected_target_id UUID,
  connection_strength INT,
  connection_type VARCHAR(50),
  connection_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE manipulation (
  manipulation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  manipulator_id UUID,
  target_id UUID,
  manipulation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  success BOOLEAN,
  notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE weaknesses (
  weakness_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  target_id UUID,
  weakness_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)
